availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaiah Ramsey (Hopkins/ Webster County, Ky, farmer, pvt 35th Ky Inf Reg. )

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. North Carolina native. Son of Daniel Ramsey and Frances Ramsey. Married to Mary A. Ramsey. Father of William Ramsey, John B. Ramsey, and James R. Ramsey. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860. Served in the 35th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from October 2, 1863, to December 29, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 126A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 600.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 359.
